title: Britain's Hotel Murders
overview: Britain's Hotel Murders uses contemporary footage, newly-shot interviews with eyewitnesses and experts who can piece together the disturbingly dark narratives of the troubling killers who used hotels as their hunting grounds and unsuspecting hideouts.With compelling first-hand testimonies the series unveils the hidden dangers which the anonymity of overnight stays can present, and the horror stories that have affected the victims to this day.
